description.narrative: By 2017, the Ministry of Education and the Regional Secretaries of Education in both Caribbean Coasts have acquired capacities for curriculum development, decentralized planning, and real time monitoring of educational management for equity.

sector.narrative: Education Management Information System (EMIS) (excluding learning assessment systems)
Provision of (formal and non-formal) primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Sanitation and hygiene - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) including menstrual hygiene management
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education
Technical assistance - Maternal and newborn health

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs Technical staff services

title.narrative: Nicaragua United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Nicaragua Country Programme Document 2013-2017 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2017 Nicaragua: Evaluation of UNICEF and GRACCS innovation pilot projects.
2019 Nicaragua: Evaluación de la estrategia de voluntariado de UNICEF Nicaragua (2018-2019)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2017, the Ministry of Education and the Regional Secretaries of Education in both Caribbean Coasts have acquired capacities for curriculum development, decentralized planning, and real time monitoring of educational management for equity.

description.narrative: UNICEF has helped strengthen the capacity of the MoE and the Caribbean Coast Education Secretariats to improve the education on offer, which includes promotion of safe and protective school spaces, inclusive education, and coordination, to aim to national and regional priorities defined in the National Education Plan 2017-2021. | Status:Met | As-of Date:24/01/2019

title.narrative: National standards for WASH in schools with a disability component available
% of prioritized municipalities that have equity education management monitoring mechanisms in place

System Strengthening - EMIS - Availability of an Education Management Information System that transparently feeds findings back to communities or school management committees - score (1-4), see guidance
